requirements.shall: All serviceable joints shall be metal gasket face-seal (/FS, VCR-compatible) with no PTFE/elastomer in wetted helium service.
Each /FS remake shall use a new metal gasket with batch trace and tamper scan.
Panel interfaces shall be female and mobile modules male; deviations logged.
Small solenoid pilots shall be fail-open so instrument-air loss does not obstruct manual isolation flow.
Leak acceptance shall meet Addendum Table 6 under ambient and standby conditions.
requirements.verify: Helium MS leak test per EN 13185 / ISO 20485

requirements.shall: DBB plus eductor purge shall achieve residual air ≤0.05% before breaking /FS joints.
QINFRA.S and QRB.S shall be protected at 1.3 bar(a) with PSV capacity ≥200 g/s helium at 300 K discharged to WCS.LP.
requirements.verify: Certified sizing calculation and PSV certificate

requirements.shall: Provide BD and PSV populations/setpoints as specified (BD 65; PSV 210) with certification of capacity.
Implement tamper-evident ties across /FS nuts with scan-based remake counting.
